original_text: So he who was seated on the cloud swung his sickle over the earth, and the earth was harvested.
korean_text: 구름 위에 앉으신 이가 낫을 땅에 휘두르매 땅의 곡식이 거두어지니라

sentences.original_text: So he who was seated on the cloud
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 구름 위에 앉아 있던 그가

sentences.original_text: swung his sickle over the earth
